website_summaries.verdict: A superb pick in terms of tone and quality, although you'll find yourself tuning it frequently.
pros: Clear and loud sound with a really nice tone
Excellent quality neck, fretboard, and body
Rosewood fingerboard and bridge provide comfort
Comes with a top-rate case, extra strings, and capo
cons: Requires frequent tunings when you're playing

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase of 2017. <3
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always wanted to learn how to play the ukulele but never thought that I could. I thought I needed private lessons. But all I had to do was look up a teacher on a YouTube. :’) Now I’m in love with this ukulele and will forever be obsessed. It’s lightweight and easy to take with you wherever you go. I love that the whole kit comes with the case, extra strings & capo. As for tuning, I downloaded a free app on my phone. :D This is me playing after 3 weeks of owning it.
customer_reviews.author: NB

customer_reviews.title: The sound it's awesome, nice price and very good looking I was ...
customer_reviews.text: The sound it's awesome, nice price and very good looking I was looking for an instrument that's sounds good And this ukulele won my heart
customer_reviews.author: RAMON RICARDO PEREZ ALVAREZ

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This ukulele looks and sounds beautiful! This is my daughter's 3rd ukulele. When she asked for this specific model, I was concerned she was going to be disappointed because it was so inexpensive and came with so much extra stuff -- I thought it would be cheaply made. But it is a really well-made instrument and the sound reverberates inside beautifully. It also came with the gig bag, extra strings and a capo. My daughter is thrilled with it, and we love hearing the sweet music she makes.
customer_reviews.author: W Meeker

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product to learn the songs they play in my daughter's music class. I like that the wood feels great and the whole products seems premium. We have enjoyed playing with it and had quality family time. I would recommend this product to others.
customer_reviews.author: Kivian

customer_reviews.title: Perfect entry level uke!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect entry level uke! This is my first ukulele, so honestly I don't have much to which I can compare it, but my instinct is that it's great. I did a lot of research, which is a good/bad habit, and I am very pleased by my decision. I've had no quality issues at all, and the travel case is actually nicer than I expected. The best word of advice I received was to just upgrade the strings, which I don't hold against the manufacturer/distributor in any way. Strings are more of a personal preference, and although the stock strings are sufficient for a true beginner, the ukulele really came alive even with just an $8 pair of aftermarket strings.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this ukulele a lot
customer_reviews.text: I love this ukulele a lot! It comes with a digital tuner, capo and back strings, which is very thoughtful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great price for small guitar
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, Light weight, good quality, easy to tune the tone, sound clear and loud. Also good for small kids use, nylon string won't hurt their fingers.
customer_reviews.author: D123

customer_reviews.title: My Go-to Ukulele
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this ukulele for myself, and I was looking for something a little bigger than my soprano. I've now had this ukulele for a couple of months, and it's officially my go-to instrument when I want to make some music (it's bumped my old acoustic guitar out of that role). It stays in tune just as good as the product description promises. It also has a great sound for the price, much better than I expected. The entire package (bag, capo, extra strings, cloth) gives the impression that the company is proud of their instrument, and for good reason. :)
customer_reviews.author: Garth

customer_reviews.title: This ukulele is very awesome. Great instrument
customer_reviews.text: This ukulele is very awesome. Great instrument,great price. I love it so much! The sound is great,too. I am having a hard time putting it down .it is a wonderful little instrument.
customer_reviews.author: jing jing

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for my husband who plays the guitar because I thought it would be fun to play with our kids. He is a bigger guy, so I decided to go with the concert size. It was a great purchase! The quality for the price is excellent and it has a great sound. It does take a lot of playing to get it to stay in tune right out of the box, but I think this is common with new strings. My daughter has also taught herself to play, so I may be purchasing another one soon!
customer_reviews.author: Blueskyline2

customer_reviews.title: Strum her slowly
customer_reviews.text: I like this uke, I like the tone most of all. It has taken, is still taking, time to get the strings to stay close to being in tune and I've had it for about 3 weeks. It would be nice if they shipped it with the strings 'seasoned' but that's part of building a relationship with a stringed instrument. I recommend you buy this with a tuner if you don't have one already.
customer_reviews.author: Chessley Sexton

customer_reviews.title: Great construction and great sound
customer_reviews.text: Great construction and great sound. My 40-year old childhood uke had a plastic fretboard (and frets) and non-geared pegs - what a difference to play a proper instrument. The concert size is great, giving just a little more space than the soprano to do the fingering and the result is a surprisingly rich tone and easy playability. The case is of surprisingly good quality for such a reasonably priced instrument. Great product overall.
customer_reviews.author: N. Keliher

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for price; great instrument for this beginner
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this after a couple days! New player of stringed instruments. Great quality for price: I sound pretty good, so great starter instrument so far. Appears well made. I like the unfinished wood face. Fuller sound as a Tenor than my GF's standard Uke, and a bit more room in the frets. Really happy I bought this. The delivery time was as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy A. James

customer_reviews.title: I like the natural wood finish
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice sized ukulele for someone who has a lot of experience or is just starting out. The size is the concert style which is bigger then the more common soprano ukulele. So for someone who might struggle with a smaller instrument, this is a good sized one to play. Overall the options it comes with for a carrying case they could be worn on your back as well as other accessories make it a nice kit. The sound is very good and it is a pleasure to play. I like the natural wood finish that it has.
customer_reviews.author: Wanpaku

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Good Quality if you Don't Want to Break the Bank
customer_reviews.text: With beginners, you want a real instrument with quality but often want to keep the instrument within a budget. This was reviewed by an independent website as being a good choice. We are pleased with this purchase. The quality and playing is as good as my other ukulele, which is a smaller soprano ukulele. The concert size is slightly larger. It plays very well and feels easy when handling it. The package arrived a day before expected. It arrived with a nice, sturdy case and a tuner. With new nylon strings, we have needed to tune the ukulele daily before we start playing but the tuning holds through the playing time. We are very pleased with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: NomdePlum

customer_reviews.title: The whole family loves this ukulele!
customer_reviews.text: This is our first ukulele purchase and my family has enjoyed playing with it since it has arrived! This ukulele is perfect for my 13 year old son, my 17 year old daughter, and even my husband that has very large fingers. It is easy to hold and the sound is great. The size makes it easy to take on the go- it will be great for camping trips this summer!! Great deal for this quality uke and the included accessories. I highly recommend this ukulele for both it’s price and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Tmac

customer_reviews.title: Great build quality, also comes with bunch of accessories
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for me as an uke beginner. I didn’t want to drop too much money on an expensive ukulele as I was just learning the fundamentals. The build quality is great. Comparing to other cheap ukuleles on the market, its wooden panel doesn’t look tacky nor cheap at all. It was nice to have a bunch of small accessories, such as extra strings, tuner, micro fiber and a cute strap. Please excuse my terrible playing in the video, as I am just a beginner in both ukulele and acoustic instruments.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: So far...unsure about it
customer_reviews.text: So far I am surprised that NOTHING comes with this ukulele, no instructions on care, no product warranty sheet, nothing that says what's included or who to contact for any help or questions, nothing printed at all. I opened the box and the travel bag with the ukulele was all that was there. The item looks nice but seems very light and not sturdy. I'll follow-up with more review after using it a bit. Just seems like paperwork should be included. Makes me wonder if this is a returned item or not?? Anyone else have this same thought??
customer_reviews.author: jean

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value - nice Ukulele
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Uke for the price! I like to play with a low G tuning, so it was nice that it already came with Aquila strings - all I had to do was change the G string. It has a nice, bright sound, hold the intonation reasonably well and comes with a very nice gig bag & little packet with strings, cloth and capo. For the money I don't think you can do any better.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey J. Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this ukelele a couple of days ago to try out this instrument. I am very much amused by the quality of this lovely instrument. Its beautiful, the quality of the wood it's made with is amazing, strings are perfect and stay in tune, along with the set of equipments being provided with it. I am very much happy with my purchase. I think it can be considered as a perfect gift if the recipient of the gift likes to start ukelele, or just like to start a string fun to use instrument, just like me!
customer_reviews.author: Aida_ty

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and great for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this ukelele because I have always wanted to learn how to play the ukelele. I feel like this ukelele is a really good starting instrument for beginners. I have been working on learning chords and I feel like this has been pretty easy to start learning on. The ukelele seems to be made for real solid wood and has some really nice components. The gig bag that comes included in this set is super nice as well. I would recommend this ukelele to anyone that is looking for a good beginner ukelele.
customer_reviews.author: Court

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: It was one of the better purchases I made for the year so far. It was a gift to my little cousin who loves exploring different kinds of instrument. She loved it right away. It was light weight, easy to carry and it sounded absolutely amazing!! I’m totally new to this but she was able to learn it simply by watching YouTube videos. To be honest I was totally impressed. She also noted that the case and the extra assessories were wonderful, especially the case! I would totally recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Great, fun, little instrument!
customer_reviews.text: I got a sweet deal on this on Prime Day. I was a basic rhythm guitar player with about 6 chords in my repertoire. Basically I stink at music. But this little ukulele was a ton of fun and easier to learn than guitar. The sound quality is very good. The tuners are enclosed and hold the tune well enough for playing. It doesn't look or feel like a cheap instrument at all.
customer_reviews.author: Someone

customer_reviews.title: outstanding uke for the price
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this is honestly a really nice quality uke for the price. the sound quality is really nice and is super resonant and warm. The strings feel good to play on and so far I haven't had to re-tune since my first tuning when the ukulele first arrived. The entire thing is just super nicely built and you can tell the amount of craftsmanship that went into it. Absolutely love this thing and would recommend it to any beginners or really just anyone who wants a quality uke for $70
customer_reviews.author: Ryder

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, includes a case and capo.
customer_reviews.text: This ukulele is definitely one of the best in it's price range, and perfect for a beginner. The matte wood finish is absolutely gorgeous, and the strings that it comes with seem sturdy and of good quality. The carrying case is well padded and I would trust it for light travel, although a hard-case would be required if you plan on doing any serious traveling with the ukulele. I was pleasantly surprised to find a capo included!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: A nice little uke.
customer_reviews.text: Well, I got my little uke today. And little it is. My first thought was "it's so cute." I haven't had a uke in years, and I just wanted to have one around to play for the children. I tuned it up--not with that curious thing that came with it called a tuner. I never had a tuner and I don't need one now. It is a bit hard for me to play with my big hands, but I will get used to it. It has a nice sound, too. The only con is that it has to be tuned after each song. I think that is fairly normal for a new instrument.
customer_reviews.author: Big Reader

customer_reviews.title: Playin like a rock star
customer_reviews.text: The ukulele is beautiful. The ukulele is Well made, it comes strung with a extra set of strings. It comes with a auto tuner, strap, and very nice case. The craftsmanship is very nice. The tuning keys are good. The strings have stayed tuned which is nice. Most inexpensive ukuleles get out of tuned with a few strums. This has not been the case with my new instrument.
customer_reviews.author: Earle Sullins

customer_reviews.title: The wires are not giving proper sound
customer_reviews.text: I'm beginner and bought it to make some practice on it. 2 weeks it works perfectly but now the wires are getting loose and it's hard to play ukulele. the quality of music is getting so worse that there is no other option except to replace it. I'm very upset with the purchase and will not recommend if you are beginner or have no idea to fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Summaira Naz

customer_reviews.title: Great begging ukulele.
customer_reviews.text: It is a great beginning ukulele for someone, who just wants to learn a new kind of musical instrument. I wanted to learn ukulele independently and after a few weeks of playing it I already learned few songs to play. Easy to tune, sounds good and when it arrived it was a lot nicer than what I expected. I’m very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Irina

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner ukulele
customer_reviews.text: I always wanted to learn how to play Ukulele. I was so excited to get my package, and it didn’t disappoint. The craftsmanship is awesome, the wood looks nice and smooth. It comes in a case like and actual guitar with some extra perks like a belt to hang it on. Overall quality of the details is great, too like I bought it in a professional musical instrument store but at much more affordable price. Smart investment for someone who wants to learn how to play ukulele.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Best $50 I spent all year
customer_reviews.text: I bought the soprano version of this on a semi-whim during Amazon Prime Days and I still pick it up multiple times a day, 9 months later! I'm very impressed with the sound and feel at this price point. I very rarely have to tune it, unlike "toy" ukuleles which will go out of tune constantly. It's brought me so much joy, that I actually just purchased a much higher end tenor ukulele in a different tuning to accompany it. This ukulele may have started an addiction and I love it :)
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: very stylish
customer_reviews.text: this ukelele is very nice looking and as soon as you get it tuned, it sounds great! the only thing is.. i wish it came with a pluck. However, it does come with extra strings which is a major plus. would definitely recommend for beginners. aesthetically pleasing to look at and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and well made
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful ukulele, great sound. I love mine so much, it travels with me everywhere I go. The case is also wonderful, I had one I was using before that I loved but now I only use this one. It protects the ukulele very well and it can hold my extra accessories like my capo, picks, tuner, and spare strings.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: ... with an economy soprano because I didn't want to waste too much money if I didn't like it
customer_reviews.text: I started with an economy soprano because I didn't want to waste too much money if I didn't like it. Lucky I stuck with it and found this Hricane tenor ukulele. It sounds amazazing, holds tune very well and it has plenty of room on the frets for me not to have to struggle. If you have larger hands and don't want to break the bank for an uke but still want a quality instrument look no further. You won't be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: wow Great uke good price and fantastic gig bag to boot! Can't ask for more than that!
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the look, playability and sound of this uke! I was pleasantly surprised and also surprised by how nice the gig bag is. The tuners are really nice quality and even with only one day are staying in tune! I've played strummy songs and classical and both sound really nice. The carved name in the headstock rather than a cheap sticker is a nice touch as well as the carved soundhole design. Nothing to complain about! I would recommend for a new uke player as well as a seasoned professional. That is my humble opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Sleepingangel (Maria Calfa-DePaul)

customer_reviews.title: this is a real instrument and very nicely built and finished
customer_reviews.text: Not a toy, this is a real instrument and very nicely built and finished. Sapele is a lesser- known mahogany-like tonewood and this instrument is beautifully crafted. Comes already strung with high-quality strings, also an electronic tuner (useful) and capo(less useful) as well as a padded gig bag. Highly recommended and a real bargain, IMHO, kat this price point.
customer_reviews.author: GHB

customer_reviews.title: ok but not good.
customer_reviews.text: I teach a class and perform. I had to file the fret bars because they were sharp. I can't get a good note after the 12th fret. However, it looks nice, plays well on the lower frets and the gig bag was great. Because of the aforementioned problems I would not purchase another one.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Wyant

customer_reviews.title: Very giftable, beautiful good quality
customer_reviews.text: This is my first ukelele, but it's really surprised me when I opened it, I'm not sure how is the professional one looks like, but this one has a good design, it's fell as a good quality, comes with a tune up that's really help, and the storage bags is really good one, provide good protection. Is very giftable
customer_reviews.author: Abby T.

customer_reviews.title: Great item but excellent customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my daughter and she loves it! Original arrived damaged to a piece holding the strings. Spoke with customer service, and after sending a picture of the damage, they sent out a replacement the next day!! I couldn't be happier with the prodict and the seller! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Christine H.

customer_reviews.title: Nice tone - good tuners - good finish - The ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice tone - good tuners - good finish - The frets on both ends are quite sharp and ragged and needed to be filed smooth
customer_reviews.author: AGC

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Just got this tenor ukelele. I already have a soprano by the same manufacturer and they are great for the price. Well built and sturdy with a very protective gig bag. The sides of the frets are pretty sharp so you may need to file them down.
customer_reviews.author: Mischief Managed

customer_reviews.title: I don't know anything about ukuleles so cannot comment on the quality but LOVE the bag it comes in
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for a little girl. I don't know anything about ukuleles so cannot comment on the quality but LOVE the bag it comes in. It can be worn like a backpack and looks like she's carrying a guitar. It's adorable. I choose this one over the others because I noticed it came with a real bag instead of a crappy plastic one.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: party time
customer_reviews.text: A little out of tune when it arrived but tuned it up and it works great!! Forgot it came with a tuner so I tuned it with an app then found the tuner and it worked great. It sounds great and has such a good quality for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Grayson

customer_reviews.title: Elegant design and great sound
customer_reviews.text: I have been playing the guitar for couple years now. This is my first Ukelele I bought. After about thirty minutes of googling and learning, I am able to play songs with the most popular chords, like C, Am, F, and G. The sound is as loud as my YAMAHA guitar. The intonation is great and rich, which make it a real playable instrument instead of a toy. The good quality bag gives it a plus. It is easy to carry along to anywhere I like to go. This Ukelele has elegant design, but not overly fancy. It made of good material and doesn't look cheap at all. I really enjoy playing it, which creates lots of happiness.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: I like the wood color and texture of this Ukulele
customer_reviews.text: I like the wood color and texture of this Ukulele. The sound resonates pretty well, and it comes with a carrying case and the capo too which is a bonus. My son likes it a lot because it is easier to carry around and bring to his friend's place anytime. Great price for the product! great buy!
customer_reviews.author: DMB

customer_reviews.title: Worst ukulele
customer_reviews.text: Worst build up with the lowest quality of sound. Never going to buy.
customer_reviews.author: ray low

customer_reviews.title: Nice sound, comfortable feel
customer_reviews.text: This ukulele is just the right size, big enough to produce a decent tone and very easy to play. It went out of tune frequently for the first week or so, and needed to be tuned after each time playing it, but by week two that had gotten much better. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: C. Funk

customer_reviews.title: Great uke for a hobbyist!
customer_reviews.text: Love this little ukulele! I am by no means an expert but this has a solid look to it and is easy to strum. The strings took a bit to settle and had to be re tuned again and again for a while, though I hear that’s not uncommon with new ukes. Either way, no big deal to me as I love this thing and pick it up almost daily still after months of owning it!
customer_reviews.author: C. Gang

customer_reviews.title: Sounds good, but becarefull on tbe edges it's very sharp.
customer_reviews.text: I would have given all 5 stars but, just they dud not do a good finished on it, its very sharp on the edges, becarefull you can get cut, you have to sand it first.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: First ever ukulele.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first buy for any ukulele and I am impressed with the quality with this price point. I started learning a bit from youtube videos. I am satisfied wit it so far and will update my review later after more usage. Satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Vishal Sharma

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Try learning Ukulele during the pandemic for a relief. Appeared to be well made. The Concert size is just perfect for me,cute and petite. And the accessaries are great,especially the tuner. I Like it.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality! Never buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Really bad! In the beginning, I choose it as my daughter’s birthday gift, while it can never stay on the correct tune!!! Never!!! Poor quality! Return! Never buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: liuyulan

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for a very great price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great ukulele for beginners. It comes with all of the accessories you need to tune and start playing. It has a very nice sound to it and tuning it was very simple with the included tuner. Overall I’m very much enjoying this product and I highly recommend it to anyone who’s starting out and wondering what ukulele to buy. This is the one for you.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Stay In Tune
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing, especially considering the high reviews. Looked nice but poorly made as it could not stay in tune through even one song. Did not have a good sound. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: A.W.

customer_reviews.title: we enjoyed it as a family since we are all novice
customer_reviews.text: This is our first Ulele, we enjoyed it as a family since we are all novice, but with a simple piano tuner app and we find ourselves gathering together to learn and enjoy music together. I cant comment on the sound quality since i am not an experienced person, but the look and feel is great and just the perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: jose sardina

customer_reviews.title: Good quality construction
customer_reviews.text: This ukulele looks and sounds perfect!The quality is such amazing,It comes with a great tuner and nice packaging with a carrying bag. Absolutely love this thing and would recommend it to any beginners or really just anyone who wants a quality uke for good price!
customer_reviews.author: lian xiao

customer_reviews.title: This is a great ukulele for beginners
customer_reviews.text: This is a great ukulele for beginners. Nice color with white strings. It’s light and it has a good size. It has a nice, big sound. The ukulele comes with its strings ready to tune, as well as 4 extra strings, a case, and a handkerchief. It is definitely what I want it:)
customer_reviews.author: Lucinda

customer_reviews.title: but so far I've really enjoyed it. It sounds good and has a good ...
customer_reviews.text: I've never owned (or played) a ukulele before so I have nothing to compare it to, but so far I've really enjoyed it. It sounds good and has a good feel to it, so I have no complaints. (Except for the complaints about my extremely limited ability to play it!) I'm enjoying learning to play this fun instrument! The included bag is a very nice bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer Penny

customer_reviews.title: Nice little Ukulele for beginner
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Ukulele for my daughter as one of her Christmas presents. The Ukulele is well made for its price and comes with a case for carrying around. My daughter is a music lover and used to play piano and viola. I am pretty sure she is gonna love this Ukulele.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great and fun for the whole family!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful ukulele and it sounds very clear and loud. The craftsmanship, wood and strings are all very high quality, and it even comes with a very padded bag to protect the ukulele. I bought the 21inch for my young son and he loves playing with it. It is very fun for the the whole family...even my husband was playing it. LOL
customer_reviews.author: SuzyQRules1

customer_reviews.title: But is sounds good to me and is a good price!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first Uke, so I can't compare, but it sounds good to me and is a good price for someone wanting to learn to play but also wanting a serious instrument that will last them a long time. Get a tuner to go with it because new string instruments go out of tune a lot as the string stretch.
customer_reviews.author: Jian R Zhuang

customer_reviews.title: What a gorgeous instrument!
customer_reviews.text: What a gorgeous instrument, the wood is so beautiful. My daughter is having a blast learning how to play it. The build quality is solid and it sounds great. For the price, you really can't beat it. It is something that is not heavy and difficult to take anywhere. I am very glad for this purchase: )
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Play's and looks fantastic
customer_reviews.text: It got here on time, packaged well, no problems. Intonation is good, play's great, nice tone. Gig bag is much better then expected, well padded. The only thing that would be better is if the neck cradle was sown into the bottom instead of Velcro in place.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: 'This ukelele is a Good practice tool practicing and uses a durable material so the strings don't pop. Many ukuleles that I've bought before all had there strings torn or something and I either had to go fix it or buy another one but his one has lasted longer than the rest but, is also soon to break.
customer_reviews.author: Clara

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful instrument with great sound
customer_reviews.text: The birthday gift for my granddaughter was a huge hit. She loves music & plays violin & piano. Entering the teen years, she wanted an instrument that was more friend oriented. Within 10 minutes she was playing & sing along. Instrument is well made & has a lovely tone. Definitely a winner!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Good starting for my kid to learn music
customer_reviews.text: The sound that comes from this little ukulele is so great. As beginner you not gonna made a lot of noise when you play it. And My kid just start to learn guitar,so i choose this. A ukulele is much easier for a child to learn to play than a guitar. The Ukeleles use softer, nylon strings that not hurt kids hand easily.
customer_reviews.author: Quinten

customer_reviews.title: This was a good purchase.
customer_reviews.text: This ukulele is really well-built and has a good sound, especially for the price range. It tuned quickly and stays in tune really well. I’m not a real fan of the dull type finish , But the sound makes up for it. It came with a really nice padded case. This was a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tone Ukulele
customer_reviews.text: Recently I wanna learn Ukulele. I found out online this one is good for me . I took some pics to show how awesome this Ukulele is. I tried some simple songs to play, Tone is very good. Highly recommend every one to purchase it. I could find some easy to learn online. There is a inside protective film to keep no bump on it. The bag is awesome too. It could carry a phone or printing music book in it.
customer_reviews.author: Zi Wang

customer_reviews.title: This is a great value --- a very nice concert ukulele with a ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great value --- a very nice concert ukulele with a sturdy case (it is not a hard case but it is a lot more substantial than the usual "included" case) and so far the instrument is keeping its tune well and the sound is very good. I am very pleased with this item.
customer_reviews.author: Susan W.

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase i ever made
customer_reviews.text: I Purchased this as a Christmas gift to self because I wanted to learn something new I actually ended up taking ukulele lessons from a music instructor who told me that the ukulele was great and it has served me very well over the past year. I did have to purchase some additional items like a capo and I use apps on my phone for measuring time. I have flown with it multiple times with no issue and it’s great that has a backpack style.
customer_reviews.author: Justacurlygurl who loves to listen 📚

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely recommend for beginners or ukulele players on a budget
customer_reviews.text: Really REALLY happy with the purchase. A fantastic uke for the price. I've had many instruments and I can say for the price range the build quality is 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Liam

customer_reviews.title: Very delicate ukulele but expensive
customer_reviews.text: The ukulele looks very delicate. When I touch it, I feel very comfortable. It is made of wood. It's like a work of art. It can be used to play, also can be used for decoration. I bought this ukulele is for my daughter as a birthday present. When she saw it, she felt very happy. She also thank me. When my daughter is playing ukulele, I am also very happy. A disadvantage of that is the price is expensive. I wish the sellers can lower the price. Let everyone to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: John kuber

customer_reviews.title: Didn't come with everything it said it would.
customer_reviews.text: I got this ukulele for my daughter for Christmas. It is very beautiful, and she loves it. Although it didn't come with everything it said it would. The strap, tuner and pick did not come with it. I don't know if this was just an error or not but it was pretty disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sounds nice and looks nice
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful ukulele. It looks beautiful and sounds beautiful. I love the color of this ukulele. I love how it comes with extra strings, as I tend to break mines. The case is really nice and protective. Over all over good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent ukulele for beginner or otherwise
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding value. Great beginner ukulele. My child has been taking online lessons and loving the new instrument. The teacher is pleased with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina

customer_reviews.title: Nice little instrument!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great little uke for the price. I’m very happy with it! I have nothing to compare it to, though
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Mariano

customer_reviews.title: G-R-E-A-T Little Ukulele!!!!!!❤️
customer_reviews.text: I’ve yet to learn to play, but my husband has played guitar for 50+ years and says it’s a great instrument, especially for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Becca W

customer_reviews.title: Garbage quality!
customer_reviews.text: Update: I initially gave a good review, but after having it for a few weeks I saw that this is a piece of garbage, it's worthless. The sound is fake.
customer_reviews.author: True Caller

customer_reviews.title: Comes with everything, including an extra set of strings.
customer_reviews.text: Comes with everything you need, including an extra set of strings. This is my second soprano ukulele, so I was able to compare its sound with my other one. This ukulele sounded a little warmer to me which is nice. Also, the case fits the ukulele perfectly with a Velcro-adjustable neck pad. Overall, a great product.
customer_reviews.author: DT

customer_reviews.title: Best instrument purchase I like to share
customer_reviews.text: This really a good purchase I have to share. I bought it for my kids. When I got it, the quality really surprised me. It is much better than normal beginners’ Uke. I played it for a week. My kids and I all love it!
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: good for beginner
customer_reviews.text: Good Ukulele for this price. Purchased before starting lessons, not knowing what type to purchase, but this is perfect. If I had known more about the types of Ukuleles, I probably would have purchased a Concert model, rather than Soprano, just because the neck is a little wider, and somewhat easier to form cords. Chords are the same between Soprano and Concert.
customer_reviews.author: Jiawei

customer_reviews.title: High quality for low price.
customer_reviews.text: This is the first musical instrument I’ve ever purchased on-line. I usually have to play them first. But I was very pleasantly surprised by the high quality of the build and sound of this Uke! Great case for taking along on the sailboat and camper too!
customer_reviews.author: CR Hoddinott

customer_reviews.title: Beginners
customer_reviews.text: Plays nicely and makes a great beginner instrument. Obviously not professional level but certainly above toy, which is what you get at the very low end.
customer_reviews.author: Chaoticmuse

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Right away I had issues with a loose washer on the tuner for the C and E strings. It was easy enough to tighten. It is made of very thing wood and it wouldn't take much to break. However, I like the way it sounds and that is what is most important.
customer_reviews.author: Prime_Addict77

customer_reviews.title: Lovely buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great uke. It’s important to remember that when it’s new, it’s not in tune and it takes about 6 tuning and playing sessions before the strings really settle in and hold in tune, but after that, it’s wonderful. I got it specifically for one song and it sounds great. Arrived right on time and I love playing it.
customer_reviews.author: Shea Adkins

customer_reviews.title: Perfect entry uke
customer_reviews.text: Rich sound, quality construction, and looks great to boot! Perfect for my 9 year old that loves playing on instruments and figuring tunes by ear. Easy to tune, and easy to play. Comes with a small capo, which is a cool added bonus. Carry bag does its job. I'm happy with this ukele :)
customer_reviews.author: A.Ray

customer_reviews.title: Jagged fret edges and G string buzzing!
customer_reviews.text: Like the other reviewers who complained about the fret edges, they are very sharp and need to be filed. Plus the G string buzzes like crazy. The screw doesn’t tighten even after moving the placement into a fresh area. Poor quality and not worth the price. Very disappointed after all the good reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Heinecan

customer_reviews.title: Great Ukelele. I'm not a pro and just bought ...
customer_reviews.text: Great Ukelele. I'm not a pro and just bought this to take on trips with me, but sounds great! I've had to tune it about every hour when I was playing it, but you have to break it in. I'm still in the break in period.
customer_reviews.author: Bastek

customer_reviews.title: Very graceful little thing!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for my friend's little lovely daughter. She likes it especially the high quality wooden outline. I think playing this would be very helpful to children because it keeps your child away from computer games and Facebook once he/she fall in love with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Yang

customer_reviews.title: Not shabby at all
customer_reviews.text: Nice little uke package. Came with a capo, a second set of strings, and a rather nice case. Pretty good sound, and improves a little once oiled. My only complaint is on the strings, which hadn't even lasted 2 weeks before snapping. Removed one star for that reason only. Overall, I was happy to have a delightful instrument to bring the joy of playing music, again.
customer_reviews.author: MartialBeing

customer_reviews.title: A heck of a “ring” for the buck.
customer_reviews.text: Very nicely built for the money. Sound was above average also for the money. Looked and sound more like a ukulele twice the price. My wife ordered it for me and got the concert size when I actually wanted a Tenor size as I play guitar and Bass and the Tenor size feels better in the hands and more fret space. Great deal from what I saw and heard.
customer_reviews.author: RidgeRunner

customer_reviews.title: Nice Little Ukuele
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 6 years old nephew. He loves it. It has a really good sound and it’s a great ukulele for beginners. The case is actually really protoective as well. I highly recommend the product!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: great value, love the sound
customer_reviews.text: great value, love the sound. good quality love the case it came in. just like every new ukulele you have to tune it constantly but that wont last long. Been playing to constantly and i just love it. Cant put it down only con was that there was a delay in my delivery. but it came a couple days later than it was supposed to. No biggie.
customer_reviews.author: RebelLiz

customer_reviews.title: Good Starter
customer_reviews.text: To be honest it most has been a sitting decoration in my room (just due to personal laziness), but it does sound pretty and works seemingly well for a beginner. The design is nice, and is overall good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Brunken

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: VERY happy with this Ukulele. Very nice quality and beautiful sound for the price point. The included case is extremely high quality with very thick padding, heavy duty zipper, and backpack straps. We bought this for our son who is learning to play the ukulele. Comparable quality in music stores will run $125+. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Iverson

customer_reviews.title: Nice uke, but the c string kept buzzing even ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice uke, but the c string kept buzzing even after changing it with Aquila strings. Ended up returning it. I might have gotten a defective uke.
customer_reviews.author: will

customer_reviews.title: 2 thumbs way up!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Hricane concert Ukulele based on reviews on Amazon. I am a beginner student. I took this Ukulele to a music camp the first week in August, 2017 and both my uke instructors were very happy with the sound and tone quality. 2 thumbs way up! I am a happy Ukulele camper!!
customer_reviews.author: 7kimmy

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, comes with all the things that you would need as a beginner.
customer_reviews.author: Raj

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful instrument! I bought this for my husbands birthday
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful instrument! I bought this for my husbands birthday. He plays every instrument but he didn't have a ukulele. Started playing it right away. Comes with a nice carrying bag and extra strings. Great purchase. I bought the largest size.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Molder

customer_reviews.title: Uke me
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my Uke! I bought it for a music course that I’m taking and it’s been lovely. The texture and design of the Uke is stunning and I love that it came with the tuner because I would’ve been lost without it.
customer_reviews.author: Fesan

product_meta.title: Hricane Concert Ukulele 23 inch UKS-2, 4 Strings Ukeleles For Beginners, Sapele Hawaiian Ukele with Ukulele Case and Ukele String Set
feature_bullets: 【QUALITY MATERIAL】HRICANE concert ukuleles which whole body was made of SAPELE, The Walnut fingerboard and Aquila nylon string.The neck was make of AGUMAN

【 BEAUTIFUL TONE 】: Smooth and accurate, Hricane concert ukelele arched back gives longer sustain, fuller, warmer and a bit deeper woody tones sound ! Aquila strings definitely help to make the sound pretty clear and sweet, it holds tune nicely.

【FINGER BOARD DESIGN 】The 23 inch concert uke has the real classic body design and come with the silver geared tuners. Some laser patterns near the sound hole which make this ukulele unique. The 18 silver nickel frets with fret position marks at 5th, 7th, 10th, and 12th, and 15th frets on top of fingerboard.

【EASY TO PLAY】Concert size is a top choice for most beginners who start to learn ukulele. The body size is suitable for most of people, and the frets are a bit more wider than the soprano, that will be easier to play.

【SERVICE GUARRANTEE 】We offer a free 30 days money back guarantee. Contact us if you have any problems with your ukulele and we will do our best to help you. Ukulele come with ukulele bag, digital tuner, strap, 4 spare strings, pickup, cleaning cloth, Small accessories bag.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars707 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
